name: Car Wash for Kids
description:
Fun Car Wash for kids. Educational game for kids to learn how to clean many different cars from beginning to end, applying all kinds of cleaning treatment and adding water, soap, polish and more. Also, once your children have cleaned the car they can tune it to be cooler.

Wash it, paint it, decorate it as you like and have the most beautiful car!

LEARN HOW TO USE CAR DETAILING TOOLS & ACCESSORIES

If you do your job well, you'll earn money to make more changes and get new cars. It will be fun when your kids see the magical result. Clean, brush, polish, paint, wax it and tune its wheels. The game offers different tools such as sponges, water sprayers, and scrubbers to wash and polish your car! Children will spend an entertaining journey learning to clean and decorate their favorite cars. It is an educational game as it teaches kids the importance of cleaning the car to make it more attractive.

You can even choose the car tires that best fit the car!

DIFFERENT TYPES OF CARS

Kids will find cars of all colors and patterns.

Small
Vans
Classics
Police
School bus
Sport cars
Formula 1 race car style

Properly clean the first cars and unlock new ones to keep playing.

Thank you very much for playing Edujoy games. We love creating educational and fun games for you. If you have any suggestions or questions, feel free to send us feedback or leave a comments.
